message.content: {"id": "124067", "title": "Bug 124067: Support relative path when selecting XML file", "description": "When selecting an XML file, the system only supports absolute paths and should also support relative paths.", "OB": "When selecting an XML file, the system only supports using absolute paths. The actual result is that the relative path is not supported. The expected result is that both relative and absolute paths are supported.", "EB": "Currently, when selecting an XML file, only absolute paths are supported. The system should be updated to also support relative paths.", "SR": "To reproduce this issue, create a new data source and dataset based on an XML file."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
